planets.name: Arrakis
planets.description: Desert planet and the only source of the spice melange, the most valuable substance in the universe. Home to the Fremen.

planets.name: Caladan
planets.description: Oceanic homeworld of House Atreides before their move to Arrakis.

planets.name: Giedi Prime
planets.description: Industrial and polluted planet ruled by House Harkonnen.

planets.name: Kaitain
planets.description: Seat of the Padishah Emperor and capital of the Imperium.

planets.name: Ix
planets.description: Technologically advanced world specializing in complex machinery.

planets.name: Richese
planets.description: Renowned for precision manufacturing and intricate devices.

planets.name: Salusa Secundus
planets.description: Harsh prison planet of the Emperor and training ground of the Sardaukar.

planets.name: Chusuk
planets.description: Planet of musicians, known for rare instruments.

planets.name: Tleilax
planets.description: Home of the Bene Tleilax, masters of genetic engineering.

planets.name: Bela Tegeuse
planets.description: Desert world believed to be the ancient home of Fremen ancestors.

planets.name: Chapterhouse
planets.description: Primary homeworld and training center of the Bene Gesserit Sisterhood.

planets.name: Wallach IX
planets.description: A key Bene Gesserit training planet for acolytes.

planets.name: Ecaz
planets.description: Lush world famous for exotic flora, including semuta blossoms.

planets.name: Gamma Waiping
planets.description: Minor industrial planet known for mid-tech production.

planets.name: Poritrin
planets.description: Historical birthplace of early human-computer interaction.

planets.name: Hagal
planets.description: Mining world rich in gemstones and rare minerals.

planets.name: Buzzell
planets.description: Ocean planet known for the valuable soostone harvested from its seas.

planets.name: Parmentier
planets.description: Agricultural planet supplying food to outer systems.

planets.name: Rossak
planets.description: Homeworld of powerful psychic bloodlines vital to Bene Gesserit breeding programs.
